title: Cant install League of Legends (lol launcher has quit unexpectedly)
body:
My brother is trying to install LoL for the first time.. and he keeps getting an error during install at about 75% into it. (LOL launcher has quit unexpectedly)
he then has to completely start the download over which takes him a WHILE... he only has 10Mb down so its several hours to try and trouble shoot this.

wondeing it anyone else has a solution for this so wen can stop doing a 5 hour troubleshoot process

his specs 
https://puu.sh/v1mU2/ba1464cd6f.png

replies.body: Unless you're out of space, getting an error that far in may suggest an unstable connection communicating with our patching server.   Try the steps on the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot, and download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to help with some of those steps.  Let me know if that gets things working out for you.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=E8OBxZpG,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-28T20:13:21.636+0000)
>
> Unless you're out of space, getting an error that far in may suggest an unstable connection communicating with our patching server.   Try the steps on the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot, and download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to help with some of those steps.  Let me know if that gets things working out for you.

I didn't actually get a chance to have him try that.. It may have been a simple computer trying to sleep that caused the error he got it on his 4th try by disabling sleep mode which kept the connection alive until it was done.. He is getting a lot of random dump file creation errors when joint matches tho.. And frankly so am I.. I know what's unrelated problem.. But that's his only issue now.. And it's intermittent and annoying but playable.. Just looks bad for him as a fresh player to see so many errors.
